api_list.name: Checks if an image contains nudity
api_list.description: Returns two fields: "classification" is either "safe" or "nudity", and "confidence" returns a confidence level between 0 and 1. An image is classified into the "nudity" category if a person's sexual organs, breast or belly are displayed.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: Url of the image to analyze
